Title: Drive with a Dead Girl
Plot: Donna and James wonder why Maddy left so suddenly.  Norma's mother arrives with news?she's married a new man, Ernie Niles.   Cooper tells Leland they arrested Ben Horne for Laura's murder.  Ben tells Jerry the only person who can prove his innocence is the missing Catherine.  The One-Armed Man escapes custody.  Pete and Truman worry about Josie.  Pete tells Ben that Catherine is still alive, and wants to make a deal.  Cooper comes face to face with the killer without realizing it.  Lucy tells An
GuestStars: Kathleen Wilhoite, Jane Greer, Emily Fincher, Michael Allan Lerner, John Moio, Mario Roberts
